statements: UPDATE equipment_maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance', maintenance_description = 'Checked and updated all components' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE equipment_maintenance_records SET maintenance_date = '2022-09-15', equipment_name = 'Laptop', maintenance_type = 'Emergency Maintenance' WHERE equipment_id = 2;
UPDATE equipment_maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Routine Inspection', maintenance_description = 'Performed routine inspection on equipment A' WHERE equipment_id = 1;

UPDATE equipment_maintenance_records SET maintenance_date = '2022-10-15', maintenance_type = 'Repair', maintenance_description = 'Repaired equipment B due to malfunction' WHERE equipment_name = 'Equipment B';
UPDATE EquipmentMaintenanceRecords SET equipment_name = 'Excavator' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceSchedule SET schedule_date = '2022-06-15', technician_id = 102 WHERE schedule_id = 3;
UPDATE EquipmentMaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_description = 'Scheduled maintenance for HVAC system' WHERE equipment_id = 101;
UPDATE MaintenanceSchedule SET schedule_date = '2022-08-15', technician_id = 201 WHERE equipment_id = 102 AND maintenance_type = 'Annual Checkup';

UPDATE MaintenanceRecords SET maintenance_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE record_id = 3;

UPDATE maintenance_records SET service_description = 'Replaced faulty part' WHERE record_id = 3;
UPDATE equipment SET equipment_type = 'Industrial' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
